author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-FOUR! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

We've got a FREE TO PLAY Indie Game to check out today; THRENODYSSEY, a Necro Cyberpunk game of animate corporate skeletons mining a world poisoned by Eldritch Resource harvesting for their magnificent but globe killing OIL. Want to become a conglomerate Necromancer? Dig Skeletons in power armour? Really into BONES? Let's check it out!

Check out the THRENODYSSEY Rulebook HERE: https://superclaymation.itch.io/threnodyssey

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow A
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 024 - THRENODYSSEY by Clay Parris
